name: Social Golfers - CR3
content: The club is concerned that some golfers may repeatedly encounter the same subset of players, while others experience more variety. To promote fairness, the new requirement is that each golfer must play with at least K distinct other golfers across the schedule.
value_info: `n_groups`: Integer, number of groups in each round.
`n_per_group`: Integer, number of golfers per group.
`k_min_distinct`: Integer K, the minimum number of distinct partners each golfer must meet.

var1.descr: `schedule`: 2D List[int] of shape [n_rounds x n_players], where schedule[r][p] is the group index assigned to player p in round r.
